website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Flyer Runner is another clean and lightweight silhouette from Puma Classics that emerges to impress customers. It features a classic design, which makes it a great everyday companion as it flatters any attire. Topping it off with materials on the sole that help wearers run seamlessly. By properly maintaining the shoe, it can be substantial and supple.
pros: According to a number of reviewers, the Puma Flyer Runner delivers excellent snug on feet
The shoe has a good grip, as stated by a couple of satisfied buyers
A handful of customers appreciate the shoe for having a budget-friendly price
The sleek design of the Flyer Runner from Puma gets a lot of praise from users
Any casual outfit matches the shoe, several reviewers mention
Some wearers admit that the sneaker performs well while running
A number of pleased buyers say that the Puma Flyer Runner has a breathable upper
cons: According to some disappointed customers, the shoe does not hold up too well
A couple of commenters agree that the Flyer Runner should come in more colorways

customer_reviews.title: Casual trainer not running

customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for 5k runs.
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews but felt I had to for this purchase. I'm a 5k runner and last 5 purchases from Nike have been terrible and causing alot of injury. These trainers are super light weight which is what I've been needing. I'm a size 10.5 and trainer weight is 260g. All my Nike running shoes are over 300g which is a huge difference when it comes to speed and comfort. Trainers are of course personal preference but for me these are the best I've bought in years. I've just ordered 2 more pairs now before they stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I have never ever purchased trainers online because i was always sceptical about the size and the material and colour. I understand why high street stores are closing down quickly now! I remember the days of going into JD sports or Sports Direct and the staff used to be somewhat rude, arrogant and only really interested in being nice to people under 25 *awful experience along with bad instore managers. I bought these thinking I would return them if they were poor quality - but i was literally blown away by the comfort and the fit. Ill purchase again when others are on offer.

product_meta.title: PUMA Flyer Runner Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Turn heads with super sleek design lines in the tech-forward Flyer Running Shoes, perfect both for everyday wear and advanced athletic training. With a fashion-forward, breathable mesh upper, lightweight midsole and added heel support, you’ll hit your stride in style.
feature_bullets: SoftFoam+: PUMA’s comfort sockliner for instant step-in and long-lasting comfort that provides soft cushioning every step of your day
EVA midsole for lightweight feel and enhanced cushioning
Rubber at toe and heel for long-lasting durability and traction through heel strike and toe off
